title: PAD-US 4.1 Easement - Conservation Easements
description: Conservation easements from PAD-US 4.1, containing 341,954 features representing legal agreements that restrict land use to protect conservation values while leaving the land in private or public ownership. Conservation easements are the most numerous protection type in PAD-US. Includes term-limited easements (see Term and Duration fields). Managed by USGS Gap Analysis Project (GAP). Indexed by H3 hexagons at resolution 10 (~15m² cells).
license_other: Public Domain (U.S. Government Work) - Not subject to copyright protection within the United States (17 U.S.C. § 105). International rights may apply.

links.title: Detailed Data Documentation and Usage Examples

geoparquet.title: GeoParquet file with 341,954 conservation easements
geoparquet.description: Cloud-native GeoParquet format optimized for analytical queries. Use with DuckDB, Polars, pandas, or any GeoParquet-compatible tool. Geometries in EPSG:4326.

pmtiles.title: PMTiles for web mapping
pmtiles.description: Pyramid of map tiles in PMTiles format. Supports zoom levels 0-14 for efficient web map rendering.

h3-parquet.title: H3 hex-indexed parquet files
h3-parquet.description: Parquet files partitioned by H3 cell at resolution 10 (~15m²). Partitioned by h0 for efficient spatial queries.

table:columns.name: _cng_fid
table:columns.description: Cloud-native geometry feature ID. Unique identifier for each easement feature.

table:columns.name: FeatClass
table:columns.description: Feature class. Always 'Easement' for this layer.

table:columns.name: Category
table:columns.description: GAP stewardship category: 'Federal Land', 'State Land', 'Local Land', 'Private Conservation Land', 'Joint Ownership', or 'Designation Area'.

table:columns.name: Own_Type
table:columns.description: Owner type code: FED (Federal), STAT (State), LOC (Local), PVT (Private), JNT (Joint), TRIB (Tribal), TERR (Territorial), DIST (District), NGO (Non-Governmental Organization).

table:columns.name: Own_Name
table:columns.description: Owner name. Entity that holds title to the land (not the easement holder).

table:columns.name: Loc_Own
table:columns.description: Local owner name in local terminology when different from Own_Name.

table:columns.name: Mang_Type
table:columns.description: Manager type code. Indicates the type of entity holding the easement and responsible for monitoring compliance.

table:columns.name: Mang_Name
table:columns.description: Manager name. Organization holding the conservation easement (e.g., land trust, agency).

table:columns.name: Loc_Mang
table:columns.description: Local manager name in local terminology when different from Mang_Name.

table:columns.name: Des_Tp
table:columns.description: Designation type code (e.g., 'CE' for Conservation Easement, 'FLTCE' for Forest Legacy Trust CE).

table:columns.name: Loc_Ds
table:columns.description: Local designation name in original language or local terminology.

table:columns.name: Unit_Nm
table:columns.description: Unit name. Official name of the easement or protected area.

table:columns.name: Loc_Nm
table:columns.description: Local or alternative name for the easement.

table:columns.name: State_Nm
table:columns.description: State name. Two-letter postal abbreviation of the U.S. state or territory.

table:columns.name: Agg_Src
table:columns.description: Aggregator source organization.

table:columns.name: GIS_Src
table:columns.description: GIS source. Original data provider or source dataset name.

table:columns.name: Src_Date
table:columns.description: Source date in YYYYMMDD or YYYY format.

table:columns.name: GIS_Acres
table:columns.description: GIS-calculated area in acres.

table:columns.name: Source_PAID
table:columns.description: Source Protected Area ID from the source agency's dataset.

table:columns.name: WDPA_Cd
table:columns.description: World Database on Protected Areas site code. Null for sites not in WDPA.

table:columns.name: Pub_Access
table:columns.description: Public access code: OA (Open Access), RA (Restricted Access), XA (Closed), UK (Unknown). Many easements are XA (restricted from public access).

table:columns.name: Access_Src
table:columns.description: Source of the public access information.

table:columns.name: Access_Dt
table:columns.description: Date the public access status was determined.

table:columns.name: GAP_Sts
table:columns.description: GAP Status Code: '1'=Permanent biodiversity primary; '2'=Permanent biodiversity primary/major; '3'=Permanent multiple uses; '4'=No known biodiversity mandate.

table:columns.name: GAPCdSrc
table:columns.description: Source document used to assign the GAP Status Code.

table:columns.name: GAPCdDt
table:columns.description: Date the GAP Status Code was assigned.

table:columns.name: IUCN_Cat
table:columns.description: IUCN Protected Area Management Category: Ia, Ib, II, III, IV, V, or VI.

table:columns.name: IUCNCtSrc
table:columns.description: Source document used to assign the IUCN Category.

table:columns.name: IUCNCtDt
table:columns.description: Date the IUCN Category was assigned.

table:columns.name: Date_Est
table:columns.description: Date the easement was formally recorded or established.

table:columns.name: Comments
table:columns.description: Additional information or notes about the easement.

table:columns.name: Term
table:columns.description: Term flag. 1 = temporary/term-limited easement; 0 or NULL = permanent easement. Important for understanding the permanence of protection.

table:columns.name: Duration
table:columns.description: Duration of protection for term-limited easements (e.g., '20 years', 'until 2050'). Null for permanent easements.

table:columns.name: SHAPE_Length
table:columns.description: Perimeter length in meters (original CRS). Recalculate in appropriate CRS for analysis.

table:columns.name: SHAPE_Area
table:columns.description: Area in square meters (original CRS). Use GIS_Acres for area comparisons.

table:columns.name: SHAPE
table:columns.description: Geometry in WKB format, EPSG:4326 (WGS84). Typically MULTIPOLYGON.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.type: struct<xmin: double, ymin: double, xmax: double, ymax: double>
table:columns.description: Bounding box in EPSG:4326.
